CustomField.description: This formula is cloned to HS Manufacturing Process for Marketing purposes. Note: This field uses colons, where HS Manufacturing Process uses commas. Be sure to keep both fields updated.
CustomField.formula: IF(Most_Recent_Quote_SheetCutting__c, 'Sheet Cutting: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_BinderJetting__c , 'Binder Jetting: ', '') + IF(most_recent_quote_carbon__c , 'Carbon: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_CNC_Machining__c ,'CNC Machining: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Die_Casting__c ,'Die Casting: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_DMLS__c,'DMLS: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Direct_Sourced__c,'Direct Sourced: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Extrusion__c,'Metal Extrusion: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_FDM__c, 'FDM: ', '') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_HPMultiJetFusion__c,'HP Multi Jet Fusion: ','') + IF((Most_Recent_Quote_Injection_Molding__c || Most_Recent_Quote_Injection_Molding_Tool__c),'Injection Molding: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Injection_Molding_Tool__c,'Injection Molding Tool: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_PolyJet_3D__c,'PolyJet 3D: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_PlasticExtrusion__c, 'Plastic Extrusion: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_SLS__c,'SLS: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Sheet_Metal__c ,'Sheet Metal: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Stamping__c ,'Stamping: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_SLA__c , 'SLA: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_LSPc__c , 'LSPc: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Urethane_Casting__c,'Urethane Casting: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_TubeBending__c,'Tube Bending: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_TubeCutting__c,'Tube Cutting: ','') + IF(most_recent_quote_Assembly__c,'Assembly: ','') + IF(Most_Recent_Quote_Other__c,'Other: ','') + IF( most_recent_quote_Other_NotIncluded__c ,'Other (Not Included): ','')
CustomField.label: Manufacturing Process
